html: To everybody hitting me about merch, They didn’t expect this many people to order things so everything was backed up. They are getting it all shipped out. You’ll have it ASAP. Won’t happen again. Love, Malcolm
text:
To everybody hitting me about merch, 

They didn’t expect this many people to order things so everything was backed up. They are getting it all shipped out. You’ll have it ASAP. Won’t happen again. 

Love,
Malcolm

html: Hi Putting this album out is such a beautiful feeling. I just want to take a moment to thank you for lending me an ear. Music is such a special thing and moments like these never cease to amaze me. I hope you find something in these songs just as I found something making them.
text:
Hi

Putting this album out is such a beautiful feeling. I just want to take a moment to thank you for lending me an ear. Music is such a special thing and moments like these never cease to amaze me. I hope you find something in these songs just as I found something making them.
